remarks: The image of a subgroup of the group ` + ` , under the exponential function of a scaled complex number is a submonoid of the multiplicative group of ` CCfld ` .  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 26-Jan-2020.)
statement:
efabl.1 $e |- F = ( x e. X |-> ( exp ` ( A x. x ) ) ) $.
efabl.2 $e |- G = ( ( mulGrp ` CCfld ) |`s ran F ) $.
efabl.3 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
efabl.4 $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( SubGrp ` CCfld ) ) $.
efsubm $p |- ( ph -> ran F e. ( SubMnd ` ( mulGrp ` CCfld ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d F x $.
$d G x $.
$d X x $.
$d ph x $.
